name: Kernel
description: Manages the basic functions of the distributed operating system

hasPart.name: Authorization
hasPart.description:
Handles identification. Login and Registration process for identifying Persons and Organizations. Also see who is online.
Also change Password is here.

hasPart.name: Actions
hasPart.description: Mit diesem Modul kannst du alle vergangenen Aktionen nachsehen und damit Änderungen einfacher nachvollziehen. Damit bist du auf der sicheren Seite wenn du oder jemand anderes mal etwas aus versehen geändert hast.

hasPart.name: History / Events
hasPart.description: Log of all events which happend in the System. You can watch them in realtime.

hasPart.name: Apps
hasPart.description: App Browser where you can install Apps for Organizations or Persons. You are currently inside of this App.

hasPart.name: Files and Media
hasPart.description: Base App for uploading/storing MediaObjects like Screenshots, Videos, Sounds and browse them. Also other kinds of work are listed here.

hasPart.name: Users
hasPart.description: Manage Persons and Organizations. Concept for each individual. For example a contact is created in my System but this user has no account. But if i know the email then the system could check and link a user (verification mark maybe). Good for creating Persons and Organization as Contacts or whatever.

hasPart.name: Chat / Messages
hasPart.description: Interner Chat für Mitglieder zur einfachen Kommunikation

name: Finances
description: Manage Customers, Suppliers and Invoices and Transactions for multiple Businesses.

hasPart.name: Patients
hasPart.description: Similar to customers app. Manage Patients and set plans for them.

hasPart.name: Invoices
hasPart.description: All Invoices in one place. Maybe good for Tax-Calculation.

hasPart.name: Crypto Tracker Test
hasPart.description: Track the current Price of Bitcoin in a 5 minute interval. This is a Demo App for Testing. This App is also only a client-side app and has no backend.

name: Places
description: Öffentlicher und Interne Standorte verwalten. Zusätzlich können Öffnungszeiten hinzugefügt werden.

name: Products
description: Die Products App ermöglicht es dir, deine Produkte zu speichern und zu verwalten. Es ist Teil einer Vermögensverwaltung. Zusätzlich lassen sich Dinge zwischen Organisationen oder Personen transferieren.

name: Services
description: Manage Services. A Service is a Product which is produced and consumed simultaneuosly.

name: Trading
description: Manage offers, demands and orders in purchase or sale.

name: Worktimes
description: Dienstzeiten, Orte und Kategorien einstellen für Mitglieder der Organisation. Damit lässt sich die Kapazität planen.

name: Reservations
description: Reserve slots and book services from therapists in different locations.

name: Habits
description: Track Habits and manage goals by setting bundaries and send reminders.
